==Trivia==
* {{w|Centzonmīmixcōa|Centzon Mimixcoah}} are the 400 gods of the northern stars in {{w|Aztec Mythology}}.
===Etymology===
* ''{{w|Centzonmīmixcōa|Centzon Mimixcoah}}'' comes from the {{w|Nahuatl}} and means "Four Hundred Cloud Serpents."
